SELECT service_no ,cs.user_no ,cs.pet_no ,pet_kind ,cs.zipcode ,cs.addr ,cs.addr_detail ,service ,TO_CHAR(st_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') st_date ,TO_CHAR(end_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') end_date ,request_money ,request_title ,request_detail ,status ,TO_CHAR(reg_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') reg_date ,cs.file_no ,nickname ,u.gender FROM care_service cs left join PET_INFO pif on cs.pet_no = pif.pet_no left join users u on cs.user_no = u.user_no ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
